dependencies.description:
Libsndfile is a C library for reading and writing files containing
sampled sound (such as MS Windows WAV and the Apple/SGI AIFF format)
through one standard library interface. It is released in source code
format under the Gnu Lesser General Public License.
dependencies.name: libsndfile

dependencies.description: Foreign Function Interface for Python calling C code
dependencies.name: py-cffi

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description: A python package for music and audio analysis.
dependent_to.name: py-librosa

dependent_to.description:
Background noise and signal reverberation due to reflections in an
enclosure are the two main impairments in acoustic signal processing and
far-field speech recognition. This work addresses signal dereverberation
techniques based on WPE for speech recognition and other far-field
applications. WPE is a compelling algorithm to blindly dereverberate
acoustic signals based on long-term linear prediction.
dependent_to.name: py-nara-wpe

description: SoundFile is an audio library based on libsndfile, CFFI and NumPy.
name: py-soundfile

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system

variants.description: Support for processing audio data as numpy arrays
variants.name: numpy
